Stated

The file you need is in here:

C:/Users/username/Documents/Disney Interactive Studios/Tron Evolution/UnrealEngine3/GridGame/Config

GridEngine.ini is what you need to modify.

search for
ResX=
ResY=
(they will = the current value)

Then plug in the values you want there, ie

ResX=1920
ResY=1080

To all the users : i need to reupload this file and it was in a quick time , i understand that some users started get the file with the 1st file and maybe continued with the 2nd and definitive , i get a torrent file download probable problem with the 1st upload , things that can happen in a upload then soon as possible i reuploaded , why i am saying this ? because you canÂ´t continue a download from 2 different files that can give an extraction error arc or 7zip doesnÂ´t matter , so the users need to download with this file from the beginning to the end and then it is impossible an extraction error , i know that at the moment of the download can look natural somehow continuing with the different file but because the fact that it is another torrent file the compressed file dat can get alternances or errors , so the safety is download the new file from the start in 0% to the end to prevent possible anomalies , i really needed the reupload , i repeat that can happen in a upload , sorry for this inconvenience to the users that get this extraction problem because this circunstancial needed reupload . Thank you for understand and happy gaming .

Good luck and happy gaming .

Happy gaming .
